title: Kurt Braunholer and Lauren Cook on Broadcast News
itunes:title: Kurt Braunholer and Lauren Cook on Broadcast News
description:
Comedians Kurt Braunholer and Lauren Cook are also husband and wife and industry pals of Chuck's. When pressed on a movie they could agree on, they picked the delightful James L. Brooks classic, Broadcast News. Listen in as Chuck, Lauren and Kurt talk all things comedy and dive into the hysterical, moving and heartwarming Broadcast News. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
